item.title: Large pothole, 9th July
item.description:
Outside 6 Linworth Road. Lots of debris in large pothole. The issue has been present for 1.5 years. The whole of Linworth Road is due to be repaved in July but wanted to report the issue as we need to claim vehicle damage of a tyre.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Linworth Road, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet
